name: BupeMe
0:
”Alexa start bupe me”
”Alexa open bupe me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bupe me
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This app lets you enable to answer your daily questions to maintain your daily activity history. If you're feeling lazy and don't want to open App just use the Alexa app and answer your daily question.

To start the application just say "Alexa open Bupe me" 

1: Alexa will ask you to speak the PIN code that you have received from the hospital. Or you can get the PIN code from the application in the profile section.

2: If Alexa does not understand the PIN code or PIN code is incorrect it will prompt you to speak again PIN code.

3: If the PIN code is correct Alexa will speak the Question of today. And you've to answer your question by saying YES or NO.

4: Alexa will confirm if the answer has been saved successfully or not.

This is the complete functionality of the app. If you're facing any issue with your PIN code please contact the Bupe Me support.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
